overview: The tension is high from the morning as Mi Ra and Yoon Gyu go on a business trip together dressed in the same clothes. Mi Ra is concerned with Yoon Gyu's various actions throughout the day. The desire to say a word fills up Mi Ra's mind.
tagline: Mira's business trip slowly devolves into her worst nightmare as she spends more time in close quarters with her co-worker.
title: Advice
